channel.title: Project X Scape
channel.description:
I've been working on a project all by myself, Project X Scape, PXS. It's been six months since i started working on this project, 30 mins a day not alot. because i was busy with my other servers. so i was wondering if i can YOUR help in making my server better.
- i remade the whole entire autospawn.cfg and shops.cfg. There really isn't the need for 40+ shops in a server and most of them are just there for no purpose at all. so i have about 13 shops on my server selling alot of stuff. and for the autospawn.cfg i deleted everything and wrote in the monsters and NPCs, one by one, it was a huge hassle lol trust me. 88 lines of code, there are bankers everywhere, walking around, and there isnt any in the banks, but there is at least 1 or 2 bankers in every city, EG: falador, varock, lumbridge, etc.
so any help would be appreciated! =)
those are the two mains points, im trying to do, the rest is done. just need suggestions where to add monsters/shops/ and/or what to add to the server.
http://projectxscape.smfforfree2.com/index.php

item.title: Project X Scape
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

I know how to code, i’m not asking you to code anything lol, i’m asking you to give me suggestions on where/what monsters OR something else you might have in mind, so i can add it to my server.

Read full topic

item.title: Project X Scape
item.dc:creator: @master_montage master_montage
item.description:
@master_montage wrote:

could you just send me something you want me to code and i will do it!

Read full topic

item.title: Project X Scape
item.dc:creator: @icauseownage icauseownage
item.description:
@icauseownage wrote:

Lol thanks, so post your suggestions here please.

EDIT: brb real quick, please post suggestions here or on forums.

http://projectxscape.smfforfree2.com/index.php

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@master_montage wrote:

ill be glad to help! i have made many servers so i can do practicly anything you need!

Read full topic
